是的，有一个名为 @(-.-)/env 的 npm 包，还有其他一些类似的包https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/technology/yes-theres-an-npm-package-known-env-and-some-others-like-it/ Sat, 02 Sep 2023 08:00:00 -0400阿克斯·夏尔马Technologyhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/technology/yes-theres-an-npm-package-known-env-and-some-others-like-it/ Strangely named npm packages like -, @!-!/-, @(-.-)/env, and --hepl continue to exist on the internet's largest software registry. While not all of these may necessarily pose an obvious security risk, some were named before npm enforced naming guidelines and could potentially break tooling. [...]
